SummaryEnglish: The Kingdom of Clays faces a dire crisis: an assassination attempt has just been made on its own Princess Lynneburg, and its neighboring countries eye the aftermath like starving vultures, plotting the Kingdom’s downfall. The ensuing conflict will shape the face of the continent for centuries to come…but Noor doesn’t have a clue about any of that! Having freshly arrived at the royal capital after over a decade of rigorous, isolated training at his mountain home, he’s dead set on achieving his childhood dream of becoming an adventurer, even if the only skills he possesses are useless ones. Sure, he can [Parry] thousands of swords in the span of a single breath, but everybody knows you need more than that if you want to be an adventurer! Our hero’s road to making his dream come true will be long(?) and arduous(?)—but if there’s one thing Noor’s not afraid of, it’s some good ol’ fashioned hard work!
Aliases: Ore wa Subete wo "Parry" suru: Gyaku Kanchigai no Sekai Saikyou wa Boukensha ni Naritai
Ore wa Subete wo Parry suru
俺は全てを【パリイ】する
Ore wa Subete o Parry Suru: Gyaku Kanchigai no Sekai Saikyô wa Bôken-sha ni Naritai

1.SummaryEnglish: If young Noor wants to leave his simple farm life and become an adventurer, he's going to need to learn some skills!

3.TitleEnglish: I Parry Taking on a Page
3.SummaryEnglish: Noor may be exhausted, but he never gives up. When Gilbert invites him for a mock battle, Noor simply can’t resist the practice for a budding adventurer like himself.

4.SummaryEnglish: The more Noor tries to clear up an understanding, the more complicated the situation gets! Meanwhile, Rein plots to use Noor as a future secret weapon.

5.SummaryEnglish: Noor and Rein encounter a vicious monster and a mysterious boy that appear in the royal capital of Crays Kingdom.

6.SummaryEnglish: The boy that Noor saved was born a "demon" with the power to control monsters. Noor sees past that and recognizes his talents, but another threat lurks around the corner.

7.SummaryEnglish: A dead man who was once an S-rank adventurer has become a vicious murderer. Meanwhile, a threat on a scale beyond human comprehension appears in the sky above the capital.

8.SummaryEnglish: Noor steps in to face the dragon that appears over the royal capital. A fierce battle unfolds; it’s time to parry every attack!

9.SummaryEnglish: The army of a foreign empire, which signed a non-aggression pact with the Crays Kingdom, finally begins its invasion. Standing in its way: Noor!

10.SummaryEnglish: Noor and his team take on a battle that will decide the future of the Crays Kingdom.

11.SummaryEnglish: Noor must use all his strength to parry his toughest challenge yet: a beam of magical light!

12.SummaryEnglish: After the battle for Crays Kingdom is over, Noor is busy cleaning away the debris. Amid the rubble, he finds something that makes his childhood days come back to him.
